channel.title: big brother on
channel.description: Recent content in big brother on

item.title: Keeping Big Brother Out
item.description: Keeping Big Brother Out: A VERY Brief Guide to Privacy Online The Principles Once something is online, it is eternal! This goes for all email, tweets, blog posts, forum posts, comments, etc Encrypt everything you want private, if its not encrypted assume others read it and know it came from you! Again this goes for all email, tweets, blog posts and comments, forum posts and comments, anything everywhere. Encoding is not Encryption!
